Reviews.Title: A good little Macbook
Reviews.Author: Joshua B. Brackin
Reviews.Content: This Macbook was released in late 2006/early 2007. Although that may seem like a long time ago in computer-time, this Macbook still stays current. It comes loaded with features that many modern-day PC Laptops lack. It's fully compatible with all of Apple's latest programs and is still quick and nimble even today. My model is loaded with the Calistoga chipset and can support up to 3.2 GB of RAM (even though Apple will tell you that it will only take up to 2 GB). This RAM upgrade makes a huge difference with the overall speed of the system. I also upgraded mine to a 500 GB 7200 RPM Hard Drive which drastically increased the system speed.It's not a gaming computer. This model comes with 64 MB of shared Video Memory. It's more than enough to stream 720p videos, but not enough to enjoy any serious gaming. This is more of a media device anyway. The only cons that I can think of are that it does not include an SD Card Port and that it only has 2 USB ports. Both of these issues are minor and are the same for all Macbooks. I can confirm that it is fully compatible with the upcoming release of OS X Lion and runs it well. I use it in conjunction with my iPad 2 and iPhone 4 and couldn't be happier. If you're someone that is looking for a good laptop that can do business and entertainment related tasks, then this is the one that you want. It's not a gaming computer or the best choice for heavy graphic work. However it will do everything else with ease and is an awesome addition to my Mac collection.*NOTE: To run OS X Lion, you must upgrade this to at least 2 GB of RAM. The included 1 GB is not enough to run the new system.EDIT: After installing the latest update for OS X Lion, the system now recognizes all 4 GB of RAM! It would not recognize more than 3.2 GB in Snow Leopard.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the Money - Good but Older Used MacBook Product
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I will try to provide potential future consumers with an accurate and thorough review of this computer.The Apple MacBook notebook offered for sale on this Amazon catalog page presents a good value for the money.  Of course, this is an older model Apple product, having been released and sold approximately at retail stores in 2007 and 2008.As such, it is reasonable that one can expect it to have some cosmetic signs of previous use (for instance, some peeling/cracking to the edges of the palmrest is a famous and common issue on the original white MacBook models), and to be of different appearance from what Apple is currently selling through its Apple Store outlets.  Apple no longer manufactures any portable notebook in a white-colored plastic body (having since moved on to the 'aluminum' colored "unibody" design).All this being said, the average consumer should still find this to be a nice looking computer, and it is capable of running the large majority of the software that is out there today for the Apple Macintosh platform (as of the time of my writing this review, late 2012/early 2013)-- probably greater than 99% of what is available today.This machine runs Snow Leopard, which offers a high level of compatibility both with Mac software products from earlier in the decade (i.e., the PowerPC era circa 2002-2006/7), all the way up to recent software releases like productivity suites such as Microsoft Office 2011, iWork '09, iLife '11, as well as serving as an above-average to good platform for Photoshop CS4 and CS5 and CS5.5, Logic Pro / Logic Studio and some light video work and editing with Final Cut Pro and Final Cut Studio 3. (None of these additional software products is included with the device, aside from the operating system).For the software all users can appreciate, the latest versions of iTunes, Safari, FireFox, Chrome, and Skype all run on this model.It can even play some not-too-3D-graphics-intensive games like the popular Minesweeper and WoW respectably enough, limited only by the use of an Intel-based integrated graphics chipset.Amazon 'on-demand' streaming video (currently Adobe Flash based), YouTube (both Adobe Flash and HTML5 based), Google Video (Adobe Flash or HTML5), Netflix (through the downloadable Microsoft Silverlight plug-in) and Hulu (Adobe Flash) streaming work quite well on this machine, although you may wish to add more RAM or limit the number of applications you are multitasking with if you are intending to have HD level video output with these streaming services (720p grade quality seems to be the upper limit on this machine for these services).Facebook applications depending on Adobe Flash also run very well on this model in my personal experience.  You can watch standard video DVDs, and burn audio discs and data CDs.  It has a built in 'iSight' webcam (approximately 1.3MP resolution) and microphone for video chatting or Skyping.This MacBook can be expanded up to 4GB of RAM (it uses DDR2 SDRAM SODIMM sticks; use 256MB/512MB/1GB/2GB PC2-5300 or PC2-5400 modules for best compatibility); it comes default from the manufacturer with 1GB of RAM, so there is still some potential room to grow.  It can handle any 2.5" SATA hard drive from the usual 60GB/80GB/120GB/160GB suspects all the way up to the current 1.0+ terabyte models (if you should feel the need to upgrade).  There is no SD or media card slot on this model. The LCD is a glossy finish widescreen display supporting up to 1280x800 resolution.  Mini-DVI video output, digital headphones out, digital microphone/line-in, 1 IEEE1384 Firewire port, 2 USB 2.0-compliant ports, built-in gigabit wired ethernet and high-speed wireless 'Airport Extreme' networking round out the set of features on this laptop.This machine does not run Mountain Lion, but Snow Leopard, as said before, can run the majority of everything important out there software-wise at the moment, and is among the most consistent and reliable releases of Mac OS X that Apple has thus far released.If you can live knowing you are not running the latest model (which may be hard for some users, given the designer brand nature of the Apple name), instead appreciating the still high level of software compatibility this model allows and recognizing the general elegance and snappiness of the Apple software interface [even on an older model], and if you can live with small cosmetic shortcomings given the age of the device, this is a *more than fair* value that should get most users through at least two years of good use.An additional plus comes from the Intel architecture of the CPU on this MacBook; you can use BootCamp, or, if you prefer, VMWare / Parallels, to run Microsoft Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 and Windows 8 as well as any PC portable with similar hardware features.

Reviews.Title: Mac laptop
Reviews.Author: DNugent
Reviews.Content: Great laptop bought one from Mac a few years back still works great and our son wanted a MacBook but he's only thirteen so we didn't want to get a brand new one just in case he ruined it so we searched online for like two months and found this one. He loves it basically exactly like mine not much of a difference. Great product decent price.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and worth it!
Reviews.Author: ScRubbage
Reviews.Content: I purchased from eSales Connect. Extremely fast shipping. Paid less than $250 total for the Macbook and shipping. It came with Microsoft Office already installed. Great customer service. The Macbook had minor defects, I mean minor. Screen is perfect, keyboard perfect, trackpad perfect, dvd burner perfect. The only thing that I noticed that I will have to replace soon is the battery because it holds only about 2 1/2 hour of charge but I found the battery online for about $40, so not bad. I waited a couple of weeks before reviewing this product because I really wanted to test it out. My uses for it include: school, programming, and streaming/watching videos. For all those uses I can't complain, it does it all just fine. I might purchase another just because of the quality and price. Hope this review helps!

Reviews.Title: THINGS WENT WRONG - NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: Didn't write a review until now because I wanted to give east coast macs a chance to make things right.  Got the run around.Microsoft office crashed and cd doesn't work and security is outdated. Researched east coast macs - BBB gave them an F andRipped Offed reported scams with ebay as well as amazon.  I should have suspected something when the computer was first delivered.  It was basically delivered in a box with one piece of bubble wrap and had a fuuny smell like it was old sitting in a basement.  They wanted me to send it back and me pay shipping but Amazon advised stop using it.  I am now renting a computer until I hope my claim is resolved.  The name of the guy I talked to at east coast name was Zac  and his partner is Fernando and he was specifically named as the person who ripped people off along with his side kick. Googel East Coast Macs and you can read for yourselves.  I also wrote this review so others can not be ripped offed through a reputable company like Amazon.

Reviews.Title: i wouldnt do it
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: so I bought this laptop and thought it was awesome for the price and it was for the first 2months or so after that the laptop started acting up the battery is not the original laptop and now the laptop DOES NOT EVEN START... to fix they are saying I need to pay aound 400 bucks at the apple store so NOTTTTT WORTH IT BELIEVE ME

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Marionr Smith
Reviews.Content: It was a big step for me to order a computer from the Internet.However, I trust Amazon a great deal.The MacBook, I use as we "speak", was listed as used.It was brand new and had minor scratches on the screen.Everything in perfect order.I highly recommend this seller!

Reviews.Title: Laptop doesn't even work.
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: The computer is scratched all over and it doesn't work. I'm able to turn the laptop on but it shuts down immediately.

Reviews.Title: 13-inch used MacBook from Beta Macs
Reviews.Author: Swayambu V. Ramani
Reviews.Content: The MacBook, a late 2006 edition, with OS X 10.6.8 (Snow Leopard) and iWorks looks immaculate when opened, though showing significant wear on both the top and bottom outside covers. Battery life is as advertised by Apple for this model. The laptop runs hot (hot to the palms).  My main objection is the "scuff marks" on the screen, which is a problem with LCD screens, it appears. People clean screens with any thing and any means, it appears, not knowing the very, very delicate nature of LCD screens (displays). If I was the Product Manager of Apple laptops, I will have a printed notice in red ink with every Mac warning about cleaning screens matter-of-factly - - people use windex, tap-water soaked cloth or paper-towel, etc., etc., and cause stains and scuff marks, like my laptop has (on arrival). Fortunately, I cannot see these stains/scuff marks when the screen is lit-up/laptop being used (occasionally, I see the outlines but barely). When the screen is dark, the stains/scuff marks look terrible. Why did Beta Macs (Company that sold me the laptop) not bother to remove these stains? Obviously, they cannot! For $400 I paid for this ancient (2006) laptop, if there are going to be blemishes, like a bad screen, the seller should lower the price by $100 and not call the laptop condition: "very good"! Very Good??

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: d474390
Reviews.Content: I was real skeptical about buying a used Mac Book online, But I have to say that this product is great and the company is also vey helpful and kind. The Mac Book came quick in the mail and well package and this product is great. I would recommend to buyers to by from this company.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price used
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I like it. Everything works. The scree does have a little damage but it isn't seen with the computer on.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: claribel morales
Reviews.Content: I wanted a Mac laptop but couldn't afford a brand new one so I ordered this older version of the MacBook and I am very happy with it. It works great and has everything I need. It arrived quickly and was packaged well.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Disappointment
Reviews.Content: I got this used laptop it SUCKED! When I got the laptop the camera was broken! I took it to a professional and they said it needed a new mother board, new camera and new battery! That costs about another $600 to rebuild the whole computer and i payed $400! Do your self a favor and buy a new lap top, it might seem cheaper to buy the less expensive lap top but you would spend the same amount to Rebuild the cheaper one. GET A NEW LAP TOP! This product deserves 0 STARs!

Reviews.Title: An affordable, yet powerful little machine
Reviews.Author: Andrew Greimann
Reviews.Content: Before in history, I remember that there were the very expensive Intel Mac notebooks, and then there were the G3s and G4s that someone could purchase, but they didn't have all the power that the newer Intel models had. Now, that has all changed, because the polycorbonate MacBooks (these) are the most popular Macs in this series, and also the most affordable. These are able to run Snow Leopard (OS X v10.6) which is still compatible with iTunes 11, Safari, Chrome, and most popular applications on the market today, even though it's from 2009. More recent 64-bit dual-core 2008 models can run Lion (and if you can figure out how to get it installed if the guides for doing so are true, Mountain Lion) which makes these earn their spot in history and makes them afforably runnable at only 30% or 40% of the price of the brand-new Macs that are coming out now.The computer is really, really simple. All the ports are on one side--including the MagSafe port these computers introduced. Simply pop the magnetic connector on or off to charge or to go (which is standard now on all the Macs). I believe these support USB 2.0, as they copy really quickly to external drives I've connected, and AirPort handles like new. The latch is totally magnetic, so it opens easily. These include sudden motion sensing, which means a drop shouldn't, in theory, kill the HDD, but I wouldn't test this with anything important on it. :) The trackpad is really smooth to the touch, and supports multi-touch, including two-finger scrolling. The keyboard definitely has the Apple quality I have come to love from previous notebooks, and is super simple to use (and clean!) Simply use a common cleaning wipe and carefully massage the keys to get the smudges off them. I really think the island style design (one of the best features used by Apple to this day) is how a notebook keyboard should be. The only problem is that the edges chip eventually, but this doesn't affect the way these run. And finally, as a complaint, the only problem with these is upgrading the memory--you have to manually pry the L-shaped shield away after removing several small screws in the battery bay on some of these, and from there, use the levers and push the new RAM into place. I honestly wish this design would have never been used, but in some of these, it's there. But, for classic fun or to run Windows without Boot Camp, use VirtualBox, Mini vMac, SheepShaver, and other fun utilities if you have time. :)In my opinion, this is my most loved Apple machine ever, outside of the Classic II and the 12" iBook G3. I hope that these work for years to come as it will always be a favorite.

Reviews.Title: World's best customer service!
Reviews.Author: Lisa B
Reviews.Content: This company goes above and beyond to ensure their products arrive as promised in the condition promised, and usually much faster than you expect. The extras are really appreciated in a world where most people are out to rip you off. Thank you for being the last of a dying breed. VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER!

Reviews.Title: Very good deal
Reviews.Author: Lisa Leach
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised that this computer was in such nice condition and works beautifully, especially for an older laptop. Very happy with our decision to get it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job but get what you paid for?
Reviews.Author: Michael Garrison
Reviews.Content: I love the laptop.  You could say I am kind of a computer geek (mainly pc) and I wanted to get my feet wet in the apple pool (more like ocean!).  I saw this MacBook as a good platform to start with.  I had figured I would upgrade the ram and hard drive with better ones that I had from other laptops but when I went to upgrade the ram, there was a sticker that said "WARRANTY VOID IF REMOVED".  I thought this was odd because the ram is easily accessible if the battery is removed.  I wound up removing it anyway and put 4gb of GSkill laptop memory in it.  It says it reads all 4gb but from what I read this OS only uses up to 3.2gb of it.  For a dual core I was surprised how well this handled photoshop.  I took this to the local Apple store when I first got it to have it checked out but the tech there said they could not service it because it was not all original.  It turns out that when it was refurbished by Wegner Media, they replaced the battery, frame around screen, keyboard frame, & mousepad with cheaper versions.  Also the previous owner did not take proper care of the laptop as there are tons of scratches on it (not the re-seller's fault) and their name was etched into it on the bottom.  I have to say, the beauty is on the inside of this one.  The mac UI is starting to grow on me.  I mainly bought this laptop so that I could have a dedicated mobile machine for web design.  It certainly beats carrying my 17" Asus g73 around which weighs about 10 pounds!Bottom line - It's a great computer but if I had seen pics of the one I got before, I would not have bought it.  Any time you buy a used or refurb item you take a gamble.Pros:- Lightweight- Great Battery Life- Everything works great, all the I/O ports work- Perfect for getting acquainted with macsCons:- If want to upgrade the ram then you void the warranty ( have to remove sticker to get to ram slot)- Case was scratched (previous owner etched their name on mine and it was not taken care of)- Tech at apple said they couldn't service it because it does not have the original parts - battery, frame around screen, keyboard frame, & mousepad (The one I got was a refurb from wegner media)

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Jimbo Macluvins
Reviews.Content: I was so worried about buying electronics over the enternet. I knew it was a bad idea. I was wrong. It works and my daughter loves it. I plan to buy another.

Reviews.Title: MacBook
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this purchase!I saved a lot of money buying it refurbished and there is barley a scratch on it. It has all the upgrades so its like having a new computer! LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Very Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Terry Smith
Reviews.Content: It was a very good buy that i am happy with thank you. I would buy from them again and be happy with it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good, with only one minor flaw
Reviews.Author: C. Areal "Mompreneur, pug lover, belly dancer...
Reviews.Content: Hubby likes this computer a lot.  The only flaw it has is that the mousepad sticks when you click it.  It does get annoying, but he'll live with it since we are die hard mac peeps and it is otherwise flawless.  :)

Reviews.Title: It is supposed that hard disk is of 160 gb and the laptop came with scarcely one of 60 gb
Reviews.Author: Miguel Monterola
Reviews.Content: It is supposed that hard disk is of 160 gb and the laptop came with scarcely one of 60 gb.the dvd burner is not dvd only cd

Reviews.Title: MacBook
Reviews.Author: Breeze11
Reviews.Content: Outdated and I didn't realize I was purchasing a computer from 2007. Not updatable and according to the guy at the Genius Bar at the Apple Store, next year the computer I purchased will be obsolete. I should have asked more questions instead of looking for the "deal".

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Brendali Gaschler
Reviews.Content: The product came sooner than I thought.I use my computer for school and it is perfect. It looks almost new and I love that has word and many other programs already installed.

Reviews.Title: The company is awesome!
Reviews.Author: alicia findley
Reviews.Content: I was worried about ordering a used laptop but now I couldn't be more happy. Its exactly as advertised, everything works correctly, and looks brand new! Im really happy that I bought it off of here. Plus It came sooner than expected which is even better!!

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: ANETA ALEKSIK
Reviews.Content: I love this PC i bought it for my son and he is really enjoying using it. It is very fancy looking like.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Crvrtgr85
Reviews.Content: This purchase was as advertised. Arrived earlier than expected and works great. Very satisfied!Only issue is the battery would put computer in sleep mode after 2-3 min. Bought a new battery  and experienced the same issue.Took it to Apple Store and they found the sleep switch to be bad (minor fix).  For the price of this laptop, I can't complain...at all.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Hillary
Reviews.Content: BetaMAcs was great to deal with and sold a great used Apple MacBook for a wonderful price. Would buy from them again. Great company and product as advertised.

Reviews.Title: New, old laptop
Reviews.Author: Shelby
Reviews.Content: I was worried that getting a refurbished laptop would be a bad idea. Some of my friends discouraged the decision as well. But when my MacPro 2007 came in, I was really excited! It functions great, and it's in great condition. If you are trying to save a little bit of money, but invest in a great product, then a refurbished mac might be the way to go!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful laptop!
Reviews.Author: The Stricklands
Reviews.Content: I love my mac! I bought it used, it came as I had expected, a few minor scratches, a little dirty, broken right clicker on the trackpad but in good working order. All in all I'm very happy with the speed, the look, and the programs already installed with my mac!

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the MacBook and plan on getting another real soon. One day we hope to switch over to apple products all together.

Reviews.Title: Apple Computer
Reviews.Author: Juanita Harbeson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son to take to college. He says it is the best computer he has ever had.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook 13" White Intel Core 2 Duo T7200, 2.0 GHZ, 1GB, 160 Gb Hard.
Reviews.Author: tracey david
Reviews.Content: works very good my 15 year loves her lap top .. she is a teen age .. she uses it all the time

Reviews.Title: This is an older version
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I do not have nothing against the older version laptop.  This is the "bible" of all macs and an usually awesome.  Just watch out who you purchase it from.  I am giving it a "3" - neutral - due to the fact the seller I got mine from sent me a bad one.  There are good sellers out there, just check them out if you can before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Gift to my friend
Reviews.Author: Warlito
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap MacBook and I ran into this. Since my friend never had a laptop and he was asking for a laptop so i bought this. All in all i like it. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied
Reviews.Author: P. Jackson "Jethro"
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to say that the Macintosh arrived in great shape and is just perfect. I was a little skeptical, so I am relieved. Works perfectly and looks brand new. We bought this for our 11 year old because a new Mac is just way too expensive. He is thrilled with his used Mac and (shhhh) doesn't seem to know the difference. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: just have a question
Reviews.Author: schwe429
Reviews.Content: So i actually haven't bought this yet (although i fully intend to :) ) but i'm just wondering if it comes with a wall charger or not. I can't find an answer anywhere on their website! help me!

Reviews.Title: Mac Book
Reviews.Author: Norman Bosecke
Reviews.Content: Works great and what a nice low price. I'd recommend "used" form this company anytime. I think it's really great

Reviews.Title: Great Macbook for a Wonderful Price!
Reviews.Author: Brianna H.
Reviews.Content: I was a little unsure about buying a laptop online, especially such a cheap macbook, but it works amazingly! Being so old, it works so fast. It meets all my criteria as well - fast internet surfing, great for holding my itunes music, a webcam for video chat. The customer service was also very great from the company I purchased mine from. I am just very happy that I did not have to spend a fortune on a new macbook when I could get an older one that works exactly the same. Great Product for a tight budget!!

Reviews.Title: HATEFUL
Reviews.Author: Kody Hurst
Reviews.Content: Mobile Devices sold me this laptop for almost 300 dollars and when I received this product, it was nothing like what they said. When I tried to send it back I was to be nice like a normal person would and said its not what I was looking for and its too expensive I can afford it right now. They were going to make me pay a 56 dollar restocking fee which isn't my responsibility and was completely hateful saying its my fault so I must pay the fee. They said "it cost me money when somebody just changes their mind and sends stuff back for no reason... this aint a rental service" I mean if your going to have a business, learn to spell and use grammar and capitalization at least. Completely hateful DO NOT BUY FROM THEM.

Reviews.Title: CrackBook...but I still loved it
Reviews.Author: C. Karczmar "fanatical shopper"
Reviews.Content: My 2009 2gb was stolen...sob. I really miss it which is why I am here looking for a used refurb.Just have to mention that some of these white models were  nick-named"crack-books" due to fact that they ummm, well, cracked. Quite literally.Mine cracked at the hinge, at one corner of keypad, and then another - all in  less than six months of careful use and in spite of TLC.  I finally purchased a nice cover - and that helped, untilthe battery power connector cable coating started to MELT at the connection!!!I spent hours researching this to see if it was common (answer, "yes, very") then many more hours arguing with Apple headquarters to convince them to replace these items.  The cord in particular was a fire hazard!I had just attained my requests, picked it up from the store all new and pretty-and then I lost it to a thief! Fie.I loved this machine. But I will caution: Get some sort of guarantee/warranty about the body and the power cord, because otherwise you could get a cracked machine.

Reviews.Title: Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: MJO4
Reviews.Content: Got the Mac for Christmas 12'. Came with generic battery and generic charger. Called and they did send me Mac replacements and now 4 months later, the hard drive needs to be replaced and Apple wont touch it because its a generic hard drive. I am so disappointed. What a waste of time and money! I dont think products like this  should be allowed to to be resold. You take everything Mac out of them and fill it with a bunch of crappy pieces and make a killing off of it!

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my daughter's laptop unexpectedly because her cat knocked over a glass of water into the keyboard.  Buying a brand new computer for her was not in the budget, but as a college student, she needed a computer.  Everything about this experience was great - fast shipping, computer was exactly as represented, came loaded with more or more updated software than she had on her old laptop.  It's been in use for over a month with no issues.

Reviews.Title: very clean
Reviews.Author: erika
Reviews.Content: I choose this waiting because i really like this mac.. is very clean, only a few scratches, but was as described by the seller.. the machine works perfectly.. and everything is ok..

Reviews.Title: apple macbook
Reviews.Author: karen mickel
Reviews.Content: I love the apple macbook. I don't like the sound that the dvd/cd makes when you use  it. I wonder if it will break soon. I also don't like the chip that it has on the back. It was not noted on the website. I had to wait a while for the computer to arrive. They had to send another laptop because I did not receive the first laptop. The issue was resolved fast. I do appreciate that. I just hope my cd/dvd drive does not stop working anytime soon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: Kennith Woods
Reviews.Content: The product is just as described. Very good deal. What we wanted at a rock bottom price! Will buy here again!

Reviews.Title: First MacBook - Awesome Buy
Reviews.Author: Faith
Reviews.Content: I was very skeptical buy a used computer, but knowing Amazon reputation, I took a chance.  When the Apple MacBook arrived, it was beyond my expection.  This is my first MacBook and I'm just overjoyed how new it looked and the quick boot up ability.  Perfect, just perfect.

Reviews.Title: 0 out of 5
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Carroll
Reviews.Content: I bought this like a month ago I've only.downloaded spotify and Skype and the computer has crashed on me. It freezes on a white screen with a folder with a question mark on it.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The laptop runs a little bit slow but works just as intended. I downloaded Microsoft office and everything works properly. Internet connection stays strong throughout its use and the battery life is decent but not the greatest. Good laptop for the price.

Reviews.Title: its awsome
Reviews.Author: C Brandt
Reviews.Content: I've seen it before and it's awesome my grandma has it too I recommend it to anyone who's looking for an affordable Macbook

Reviews.Title: Solid computer
Reviews.Author: Stephen Collum
Reviews.Content: A good laptop at a good price. The only con is the amount of system memory, which I increased immediately.

Reviews.Title: Some Things Not Right
Reviews.Author: Tranea
Reviews.Content: I half to press buttons more then one time to write .with that being said im slightly unhappy with that

Reviews.Title: Used Mac Book
Reviews.Author: Shannon Cook
Reviews.Content: The laptop arrived on time, with a new display and keyboard, in clean condition. Operating system is updated to as advertised, its in impeccable condition!!!

Reviews.Title: Macbook
Reviews.Author: Krystal
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the how fast I got my computer and excellent condition! If I ever need anything will definitely use them again

Reviews.Title: My new apple computer
Reviews.Author: sherry umber
Reviews.Content: It arrived in excellent condition and looks brand new. It does take some used to using the different keys and without a mouse. I am used to using a desktop. It is very portable and small and light enough to take just about anywhere. I am typing this review on it . I also Love the white color , so much prettier than black.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: sgs
Reviews.Content: Arrived fast and in great condition, especially for an older Macbook. Ordered it for my kid as homework computer, who is very happy with it now - a great compliment since usually he isn't thrilled with "used stuff".

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Had it for about 3 weeks now and have had no problems. Works great, fast, and easily updates to new software. Had a question for them and they sent me an instant email to answer my question.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Borges
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much for the quality of the product is good and I highly recommend it, just continue like delivering quality products and competitive.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Clarence Price
Reviews.Content: The only reason i rated it a 4 is because i am a highschool student and i can not do much i have to take it to apple and get it upated and buy more space to get it running like the new one , i would rec. it but , i think you sholud think long and hard about it.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I was Hoping for
Reviews.Author: christi Brodeur
Reviews.Content: It came in time for christmas and is for my daughter who enjoys it very much.Everything thing she needs is at her fingertips. she didn't mind the little chips which has nothing to do with the great screen quality.thanks.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: happy customer
Reviews.Content: My daughter is extremely happy with her pc..  It was a great price for a refurbished item and in great shape.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: K10ant
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical buying a laptop online, not being able to see it first or talk to anyone but it came just as promised and works great! My son is very happy, I feel like I got a great deal and a quality product! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Right side of mouse,,InOp
Reviews.Author: David K. Walker
Reviews.Content: the right side of the mouse does not work and nothing was stated in the discription about the laptop having any issues. Had to buy a separate wireless mouse.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service!!
Reviews.Author: Fernanda Constante
Reviews.Content: Great product! I bought a MacBook months ago, but I think it is necessary to leave a comment for this seller. Great customer service, high quality product. I sent it overseas as a gift and it works perfectly. Plus, delivery time is fast and seller is very responsible on its transactions. I bought a second one !! Same experience, great product/ service.

Reviews.Title: It's pretty cool!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I love it! The only reason I gave it four stars is because it has a little bit of scratches on the top of it, but if you throw a case on top of that...whose going to notice?  It's super cute, and even though its like a "vintage" Mac, it works just as well as the more recent ones! Totally Recommend it! and it's not 1000 bucks!

Reviews.Title: Better than described!
Reviews.Author: Michael W Alder
Reviews.Content: Item was virtually brand new; hasn't even been touched from what I could see. It also came with lots of really expensive software that wasn't advertised but a great bonus!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my son and I am so pleased with not only the computer but with the customer service I received from Joe.  I needes this expedited and he not only was able to do this for me, he actually did it for free.  He also called me directly to make sure I knew it was coming.  When it was delivered and turned on I was so impressed by how well it worked.  It is still working as well today.  If you are considering buying this I would say to do so with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled to bits and pieces!
Reviews.Author: AmazingReviewer
Reviews.Content: It's over a year later and I still love my "new" Mac. It runs like a dream. I've never had any issues with it beyond the magnetic power cord falling apart, very quickly actually. So I bought a new one, maybe $10? Small price to pay. This Mac was a fantastic deal, and I would definitely buy from them again!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Travis King
Reviews.Content: I love this computer! This is the perfect computer for school. I got the Late 2007 Macbook for around $300 then bought Pages, Keynote, and Numbers '08 for only $20. To make the computer that much better I upgraded the Ram from 1 GB to 4 GB for $50. This computer will blow away pretty much any brand new Windows computer at that same price point. If you're looking for a computer to get your kids for school or Christmas then you should seriously consider buying a refurbished Mac.

Reviews.Title: Does it Yellow?
Reviews.Author: Angiem
Reviews.Content: Is this the 2009 version?  If it is does it yellow?  Because I want to get this one but I dont want it to yellow after time.  I want it because of the white one the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Switching from Windows to MAC...
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Baez
Reviews.Content: It was an amazing buy; I enjoy it everyday, it's definitely a big change from my windows pc still getting the hang of it.

Reviews.Title: Computer
Reviews.Author: Quianna Lewis
Reviews.Content: This computer caused me more stress than it was worth. The battery was pretty much gone when I got it so I had to take the charger with me everywhere and make sure the computer stayed on the charger or it would shut off. After a couple months it just stopped working and when I took it to the apple store they told me it would be more beneficial to just buy a brand new computer. This was $200-300 that I could have saved. Not only did I waste money but I was pretty embarrassed when someone used my computer and it would shut off because they accidentally took it off the charger. They don't even make parts for this computer anymore because it so old. Also it being so old it ran on an older operating system.

Reviews.Title: APPLE
Reviews.Author: kenneth
Reviews.Content: i like it. it is evey thing iever want when i am looking for a computer it made this soldier happy

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with the product. When I took it out of the box it had a yellowish tint to it. When I turned it on and began to use it I noticed that the backlight was kind of fading in and out as if it is going to go out soon. I know the computer is old but it is not in as good of a condition as I had hoped.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: Dabeauty13
Reviews.Content: It took a minute to get the with the program but after I figured it out it was all good. Never really saw all of the stuff they were saying about it. (That's just how minor they are. All about learning about the apple world!!!

Reviews.Title: My Daughters MacBook
Reviews.Author: Gary Smith
Reviews.Content: She loves it. She was so excited when I told her that I was sending this to her. It arrived in less than a week! I'd been telling her I would buy her one for a few months and now I have. It came with the Snow Leopard operating system and Windows '08 too. She loves to write, take funny pictures and make her own movies. This will be great for her. Thank you so much for the price, quality of your business and how you took care of this computer.

Reviews.Title: Upon Further Inspection, Disappointing...
Reviews.Author: Caitlyn Lajoie
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving this computer, everything looked great. Within a few days though, serious problem arose. It lags terribly and freezes constantly. It will not allow me to use itunes unless I pay to upgrade my operating system (because the operating system is too old). I am not able to delete or add anything. I have a few files on the computer (for school) and that seems to be all I can have. The computer just overall doesn't work and I understand each refurbrished computer will be different from every other. This one is a lemon though, and I want my $500 (almost) dollars back since it is not worth it EVEN REMOTELY.

Reviews.Title: For the price, I was pleased with this product
Reviews.Author: Bonnie J. Finn
Reviews.Content: I own 2 other Mac products and purchased this for my sister. She is pleased with how fast it is and clear the pictures are. She had the original iMac and it died. I have never purchased a used computer before but was not disappointed. The case had a little damage on the corner and she cleaned up the outside case. We are all a bit OCD. I am convinced it's life will be longer than a new PC.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished = Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brit  Engbrecht
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this product!  So many people think refurbished electronics, especially computers are not good purchases,  I beg to differ.  My MacBook Pro is in overall good shape externally and is up to date and up to par internally with its operating system.  I saved about $1800 by buying a refurbished Mac that does everything a "brand new" one does.  Laptops USA is a very reputable company and I am going to recommend them for sure!  I saw their high feedback percentage and was sold at their prompt service and feedback that others left.

Reviews.Title: MacBook.
Reviews.Author: Vinyl Lover
Reviews.Content: Came well before commit date. . Better condition than I expected. Disk, RAM, OS and CPU as advertised. Booted right up. Gift for my daughter she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Would not boot on arrival
Reviews.Author: James Orndorff
Reviews.Content: This was a christmas gift--I live in Washington state and it was for my mother who lives in California.  At Christmas when it was opened although it would turn on, it would only give a flashing question mark.  After several days of calls to the vendor, the vendor had my mother dismantle it and remove the hard drive and send it in for repair (being in a different state I was unable to help).  A few days later a replacement hard drive came and had to be reinstalled.  At that time the laptop worked.The laptop itself is a good product, but when the vendor advertised that it was refurbished--all repairs should have already been made and IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN OPERATIONAL AT THE TIME OF RECEIPT.

Reviews.Title: Apple Macbook Review
Reviews.Author: Helen Protho
Reviews.Content: I did not realize it was such an old outdated model.  I paid too much for it.  I should have gotten advice from my son when I selected this product.  I knew nothing about Apple Products and I thought I was getting a good deal on it.  My son had gotten a good deal on a later model Macbook for about $300 dollars more at the commissary at his base so I thought I was getting a good deal on an up to date model like his.  When he saw it, he told me that this was one of the oldest Macbooks that they made.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Battery Problems -- Please Read
Reviews.Author: _Rycho
Reviews.Content: My daughter's MacBook Air battery bulged deforming the keyboard couple days ago. It took 3 days to make an appointment at the local Apple store. I'm not sure what happened next but she came back home crying with a piece of paper in her hand that showed $129 for new battery, $39 to replace it and $139 for a new keyboard. I could not believe they did not consider the battery as defective so I went to the Apple store myself and asked for a manager.  He explained to me the battery expansion is "normal".  Apple doesn't cover battery expansion under any circumstances not even under the Apple Care.  The battery is simply considered "consumable" and NOT covered.I asked the manager if he feels comfortable with me posting the picture of the MacBook Air on the internet with the description that Apple doesn't consider the product defective.  His reply astonished me, looking down at me from behind his thick glasses he said: "Make sure you have your facts straight before you smear! They will contact you."  He didn't specify who are "they" but from the tone of his voice and his 6'5" posture it indicated something between the SWAT team and a bunch of LAWYERS.Here is my take on all of this, the business model Apple pushes right now is to get some cheap junk from China, hire a bunch of cheerleaders straight out of high school, call them geniuses, and bully everybody who complains about their product.  Steve Jobs is dead, so is Apple.No more Apple devices in my household.  Please Google "MacBook battery bulging exploding" before you buy your next Apple toy.

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: LT
Reviews.Content: I am really using this to my advantage after 2 years it has been making a bad noise and sometimes a message would come on telling me I have to log off.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jeff Smith
Reviews.Content: The MacBook was in great shape, everything works as advertised. The case had minimal wear.  The only complaint is that the original charger broke on it's first use and I had to get a new after market charger.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Douglas Decker
Reviews.Content: Great computer! More than what I had expected, I will be ordering another soon for my wife. Thanks so much.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: hlj
Reviews.Content: The MacBook is in great condition.  I charged it up, reset the password and it works great!  I already recommended you to a few of my friends.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Vhippie
Reviews.Content: My almost brand new MacBook came in the mail three days after I ordered it. I'm so happy I decided on this particular Mac! I chose the one with the 30 day warranty as a just in case. It came neatly wrapped, with very little body wear. There's a one inch hairline crack by the trackpad, but it inhibits the function of the laptop in no way. Other than that, the condition is perfect. The screen and trackpad have no scratches smudges or dents. Started up upon arrival with no complications, and the battery life lasts 4-6 hours. I strongly recommend this seller to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Lauri Maddock
Reviews.Content: Computer was exactly as described and it was sent quickly.great addition to my classroom. Thinking of buying another one more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Good Performance
Reviews.Author: Roberto Sansiviero
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Even Better that I expected, as the other things I've order thru Amazon... It had all the Programs and Features I needed and was in a Perfect state.So, Thank You!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core 2 Duo T7200 Processor 2GHz
1GB DDR2 RAM
160GB Hard Drive
13-Inch Screen, Intel GMA 950
Apple Mac OS X v10.6 Leopard
ProductInfo.Name: Apple MacBook 13" White Intel Core 2 Duo T7200, 2.0 GHZ, 1GB, 160 Gb Hard Drive, DVD Burner, Wi-fi, Camera, Mac Os 10.6 Snow Leopard and Ilife
